Package com.oracle.coherence.cdi.events

Class EventObserverSupport

java.lang.Object
com.oracle.coherence.cdi.events.EventObserverSupport
public class EventObserverSupport extends Object
Manages registration of CDI observers with InterceptorRegistry upon ConfigurableCacheFactory activation, and their subsequent un-registration on deactivation.
Since:
20.06
Author:
Aleks Seovic 2020.04.03
